author: Pythagoras
quote: A fool is known by his speech; and a wise man by silence.

author: William S. Burroughs
quote: Silence is only frightening to people who are compulsively verbalizing.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.

author: Criss Jami
quote: The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it.

author: Edith Sitwell
quote: My personal hobbies are reading, listening to music, and silence.

author: Woody Allen
quote: God is silent. Now if only man would shut up.

author: Will Rogers
quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.

author: Arthur Conan Doyle,Â The Complete Sherlock Holmes
quote: You have a grand gift for silence, Watson. It makes you quite invaluable as a companion.
